alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Harrison; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:27PM EDT until May 01 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DODDRIDGE...EAST CENTRAL TYLER AND NORTHWESTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Salem, or 15 miles southeast of Middlebourne, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lumberport, Center Point, Sedalia, Wallace and Lima. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
